remarks: A simple limit of fractions is computed.  (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 30-Jun-2017.)
statement:
stirlinglem1.1 $e |- H = ( n e. NN |-> ( ( n ^ 2 ) / ( n x. ( ( 2 x. n ) + 1 ) ) ) ) $.
stirlinglem1.2 $e |- F = ( n e. NN |-> ( 1 - ( 1 / ( ( 2 x. n ) + 1 ) ) ) ) $.
stirlinglem1.3 $e |- G = ( n e. NN |-> ( 1 / ( ( 2 x. n ) + 1 ) ) ) $.
stirlinglem1.4 $e |- L = ( n e. NN |-> ( 1 / n ) ) $.
stirlinglem1 $p |- H ~~> ( 1 / 2 ) $.
